statements: SELECT user_id, balance, transaction_history FROM user_wallet WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_wallet WHERE balance > 100.00;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM user_wallet WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT balance, user_id FROM user_wallet ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_wallet WHERE transaction_history->'status' = 'completed';
SELECT user_id, balance FROM user_wallet WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM user_wallet WHERE transaction_history ->> 'type' = 'deposit' ORDER BY balance ASC
SELECT user_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM user_wallet GROUP BY user_id HAVING SUM(balance) >= 5000 ORDER BY total_balance DESC
SELECT * FROM user_wallet WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND balance < 5000
SELECT user_id, balance FROM user_wallet WHERE balance < (SELECT AVG(balance) FROM user_wallet) ORDER BY user_id
SELECT * FROM user_wallet_balances WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM user_wallet_balances ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction_history GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM transaction_history GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM user_wallet_balances WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT * FROM user_wallet_balances ORDER BY balance DESC
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction_history GROUP BY user_id
SELECT user_id, balance, transaction_date FROM user_wallet_balances JOIN transaction_history USING (user_id) WHERE balance > 100
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY amount
SELECT * FROM user_wallet
SELECT user_id, wallet_balance FROM user_wallet ORDER BY wallet_balance DESC
SELECT user_id, wallet_balance FROM user_wallet WHERE wallet_balance > 1000
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, amount, transaction_date FROM transaction_history WHERE user_id = 1234
SELECT log_id, action, user_id, timestamp FROM audit_log ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT * FROM user_wallet ORDER BY wallet_balance DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, SUM(wallet_balance) AS total_balance FROM user_wallet GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_balance > 5000;
SELECT user_id, wallet_balance FROM user_wallet WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000);
SELECT t.user_id, t.transaction_type, t.amount, a.action FROM transaction_history t JOIN audit_log a ON t.transaction_id = a.transaction_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transaction_history GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_transactions DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, wallet_balance FROM user_wallets ORDER BY wallet_balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE action = 'login' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_wallets LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, wallet_balance FROM user_wallets WHERE wallet_balance > 1000;
SELECT u.username, t.amount, a.action FROM users u INNER JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id INNER JOIN audit_logs a ON u.user_id = a.user_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Wallets;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM Wallets ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM Wallets WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, amount, timestamp FROM Transactions ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM Users WHERE user_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM Wallets WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, balance FROM Users JOIN Wallets ON Users.user_id = Wallets.user_id;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp FROM Transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, action FROM AuditTrail WHERE action LIKE '%login%';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(address_id) AS total_addresses FROM Addresses GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_addresses > 1;
